artist: Andy Baird; Mike Brehm; Robert Corbit; Mike DeVoni; Jane Filer; Frank Gaard; Don Holzschuh; Joe Hoppe; Chris Karcher; John Largaespada; Mike McCoy; Denise Monaghan; Ann Morgan; Muzo; Craig Smith; Tim Walton; Jon West; Chris Woodward; Published by Artpolice
description: 20 pages, saddle-stapled; white paper covers; small black and white newsletter publication with "The Artpolice" lettering and words "authorative easy to use" at UL;  magnifying glass with 2 faces at UR; image at bottom of Christ-like figure smoking a cigarette and holding a dagger in his PR hand; same as 2015.100.48 except for color
title: Artpolice, Vol. 15. No. 1
